name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Seagull - Add Reviews and Gameplay to Steam

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add reviews and gameplay videos to the Steam store

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Don't like wading through pages and pages of text to figure out whether you should buy a game? Don't like opening endless new tabs to search for reviews and videos of gameplay?

With Seagull, you can watch reviews and gameplay videos all without leaving a game's Steam page.
